citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b)
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30-4:30 on
03/03/2015. The inspector called both phone numbers listed for the licensees, left voice messages and waited at
gaited entrance for 1 hour.
